indian.details: Visa on Arrival (14 days) POSSIBLE ONLY if you hold a valid US Visa, Green Card, or UK/EU Residence. Otherwise, pre-arranged visa required.

us.details: Free visa on arrival for 30 days.

activities.title: DXB Airside Food + Coffee Run
activities.description: Late-friendly and no-visa friendly. Grab proper meals, coffee, desserts, and do a terminal walk. Keywords: airside, late night, food, easy.

activities.title: Dubai Duty Free (DXB)
activities.description: Airside shopping mission: perfumes, electronics, snacks, gifts. Best when user asks to shop/buy/souvenirs. Keywords: shopping, duty free, gifts.

activities.title: DXB Lounge Reset (Showers + Quiet seating)
activities.description: Comfort play for long or overnight layovers. Showers + food + quiet. Keywords: relax, shower, lounge, rest.

activities.title: Burj Khalifa + Dubai Mall Fountain Area
activities.description: Dubai’s #1 iconic sightseeing zone. Even if you don’t go up, the area gives maximum ‘Dubai’ vibe: fountains, skyline photos, massive mall. Keywords: burj khalifa, landmark, skyline, photos, sightseeing.
activities.founders_tip: For max sights on a 8–14h layover, this should usually beat ‘hotel’ options unless user asked to sleep.

activities.title: Dubai Marina Walk (Night skyline vibes)
activities.description: Aesthetic skyline walk, especially evening/night. Chill sightseeing + cafes. Keywords: marina, night walk, skyline, photos, chill.

activities.title: Old Dubai: Al Fahidi + Dubai Creek Abra
activities.description: Culture/history vibe: old streets + quick boat ride (abra) across the creek + markets nearby. Keywords: culture, history, old dubai, souk, local.
activities.founders_tip: This is CULTURE + sights + shopping (markets), so it should rise for culture/food/souvenir vibes.

activities.title: Gold Souk + Spice Souk
activities.description: Classic market-style shopping + photo vibes. Works for souvenirs and quick exploring. Keywords: souk, shopping, culture, photos.

activities.title: Jumeirah Beach (Quick beach reset)
activities.description: Beach + skyline photos. Chill, low effort, good for ‘relax’ vibes. Keywords: beach, relax, sunset, photos.

activities.title: Airport Hotel / Sleep Block (DXB)
activities.description: SLEEP ONLY. Recommend only when user explicitly wants sleep/nap/rest/shower or it’s overnight with limited sightseeing time windows. Keywords: sleep, nap, bed, overnight, rest.
activities.founders_tip: Should not outrank sights unless user asks to sleep.
